荵荵荵

荵字的基本解释

荵
rěn
〔荵冬〕同“忍冬”，一种藤本植物，即金银花。

荵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rěn］
［《廣韻》而軫切，上軫，日。］
(1)见“荵冬”。
(2)隐荵菜。

荵字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荵； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1032第06
【唐韻】而軫切，音忍。【說文】荵冬草。【爾雅·釋草】蒡，隱荵。【註】似蘇有毛，今江東呼爲隱荵，藏以爲菹，亦可瀹食也。　又上聲。【集韻】而振切，音刃。義同。

荵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
荵字的起名意思

暂无。

Deer
Basic explanation of words
Deer
rěn
〔荵冬〕Same as "Lonicera", a kind of vine, namely honeysuckle.
Deer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rěn]
["Guangyun" and Zhen cut, Shang Zhen, day. ]
(1) See "Xundong".
(2) Hidden Dessert.
Deer
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　荵; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1032 Page 06
[Tang Yun] But Zhen cut, sound forbearance. [Said the text] Devil grass. [Erya·Shucao] burdock, hidden deer. [Note] It is like Su Youmao, now Jiangdong is called "Hidden Deer".　Sound again. [Jiyun] And vibrating, sound blade. The same meaning.
Deer
